title: XL two bedroom apt right ON Prospect Park!! LAUNDRY!!On B/Q
posting_body: ['RENT STABILIZED TWO BEDROOM* LAUNDRY IN BUILDING!', '**Video available upon request*', 'UNBELIEVABLY UNDERPRICED!', 'A BLOCK AWAY FROM PROSPECT PARK*', '- Just half a block to the B, Q, trains', '- Heat & hot water included', '- Rent stabilized', '*- LAUNDRY IN THE BUILDING!*', '- Very well kept, Elevator building', '- On-site super', '*The neighborhood:*', 'Explore this architecturally rich neighborhood that is the new destination for those looking for the best in both proximity and price', 'Just minutes from Manhattan, there are multiple transportation options, including the 2, 5, and B, Q trains.', 'Nearby entertainment options abound from the BAM cultural district and the developing Atlantic Yards to The Brooklyn Botanic Garden and the Brooklyn Museum.', '*Prospect Park – with its broad outdoor spaces, tennis courts, ballfields, and lake – only steps away.*', "With new restaurants and shops continuously moving in, you'll find that this is a dynamic, growing neighborhood with plenty to offer."]
